name: Cosmic Dessert
description:
AD - Move left/right

Space - Jump 

Esc - Pause

You will have to figure out what triggers the cheats yourself. This is a very early prototype of an idea I had, and it was lots of fun to make. I hope you enjoy this short game. There is some functionality that I realize I forgot to implement but I may possibly update that in the future

Used this for the explosion noise and everything else was made by me
